mapper.select: select id, agent_id as agentId, send_status as sendStatus, source_type as sourceType, source_id as sourceId, create_time as createTime, handle_time as handleTime, resend_num as resendNum from hdg_push_order_message where send_status = #{sendStatus} order by id asc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into hdg_push_order_message (agent_id, send_status, source_type, source_id, create_time) values(#{agentId}, #{sendStatus}, #{sourceType}, #{sourceId}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update hdg_push_order_message set send_status = #{sendStatus}, handle_time = #{handleTime}, resend_num = #{resendNum} where id = #{id}
